text: nursing home policies regarding notice of vacancy a public or private nursing home or assisted living facility for which residents are paying out of pocket shall not enforce a notice of vacancy policy in the event of the resident s death the nursing home or assisted living facility shall be entitled to rent and fees for not more than days from the date of the resident s death if there is personal property to remove that impedes the reuse of the room the period shall not begin until after the family estate or responsible party has removed the deceased person s personal property if the room is occupied by a new resident before the expiration of the period rent and fees for the period shall be prorated from the date of such occupancy and returned to the family estate or other responsible party
